mapper.update: UPDATE commodity SET ${filed2} = #{value2}, update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE ${field1} = #{value1}
mapper.select: SELECT c.id,c.name AS cname, c.is_on_shelf, p.price,v.name AS vname, ci.url FROM commodity c LEFT JOIN commodity_image ci on c.id = ci.commodity_id LEFT JOIN variety v on c.variety_id = v.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT commodity_id,MIN(price) AS price FROM commodity_info WHERE shop_id = #{id} GROUP BY commodity_id) AS p ON c.id = p.commodity_id WHERE c.shop_id = #{id}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM commodity WHERE shop_id = #{id}
